name: Roblox, cleaned up
description:
Blocks ads, removes annoying stuff, and does other things to clean up the Roblox website. uBlock Origin goes great with this userstyle, you should get it if you haven't already!

Like the night? Or just dark stuff? You can use ona2000's Dark Roblox v3.0 userstyle with my style, the two go together very well!

~ Use of this userstyle is recommended with Stylus. A better (and also telemetry-free) userstyles extension. ~

user.name: AGuyMakingStyles
user.about: If you are using the Stylish extension, STOP USING IT. Since January of this year, Stylish is now a part of "SimilarWebâ€™s market research panel" (source) and is tracking you, collecting your userdata. Instead of this being an opt-in feature, it's enabled by default and you have to opt-out of it in settings or something. I still wouldn't recommend using Stylish, even if you are able to opt-out of the telemetry insanity. Instead, try out Stylus, a modified fork of an old version of Stylish that was released before the original developer stopped working on the extension: https://github.com/openstyles/stylus/blob/master/README.md
